schema.name: Potato Carrot in Coconut Oil

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the baby potatoes thoroughly and peel the carrots.
Dice the carrots into small pieces.
In a pan, heat the extra virgin coconut oil over medium heat.
Add the baby potatoes to the pan and cook for 10 minutes until they start to become tender.
Add the diced carrots to the pan with the potatoes and cook for an additional 15 minutes, stirring occasionally until both are fully cooked and slightly golden.

schema.description: This Potato Carrot in Coconut Oil recipe is a perfect representation of low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar eating that doesn't compromise on taste. Ideal for anyone looking to enjoy healthy yet delicious meals, it's a testament to how simple ingredients can create a nutritious dish that's both satisfying and health-conscious.
